advocate.title: Email CA Governor Gavin Newsom
advocate.subtitle: Make your voice heard by emailing those in power in government

emailInfo.subject: Condemn police brutality
emailInfo.messageBody:
Dear Governor Newsom,

My name is [Your Name] and I am constituent from [Your location]. I am contacting you because I want to know what you will do to protect black lives and prevent further instances of police brutality. I am calling to urge you to condemn police brutality, racial profiling, and the use of excessive force by police.

Sincerely,

[YOUR NAME]

act.title: BLM LA
act.subtitle: Get involved with a Black Lives Matter chapter in your state to join protests and take other actions to support the movement.
